Texts.Eng:
Not much is known about the Taurikin. It is rumoured that they were once 2 seperate species.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.2^reset;, Food x^green;1.2^reset;
  Jump Height +^green;15^reset;%, Fall Damage x^green;0.9^reset;
  Speed +^green;30^reset;%
  Immune: Mud, Snow, Jungle Dirt

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Forest and Jungle^reset; biomes: Health x^green;1.1^reset;
  ^green;Lush and Tundra^reset; biomes: Speed +^green;10^reset;%
  ^red;Cold^reset; biomes: E. Regen: -^red;10^reset;%

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Spears and Shortspears: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;
  Bows: Damage x^green;1.02^reset;, Crit Chance +^green;5^reset;%, Crit Damage +^green;2^reset;%
  Wands and Staves: Damage x^red;0.9^reset;, E. Regen -^red;5^reset;%
  Sniper Rifles: Damage x^red;0.85^reset;, Crit Chance -^red;1^reset;%

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Hunger +^red;25^reset;%
  Defense x^red;0.9^reset;
Texts.Chs:
关于陶里克，我们所知不多。据传，它们曾经是两个独立的物种。

^orange;饮食^reset;：草食动物

^orange;天赋^reset;：
能量x ^green;1.2 ^reset;，食物x ^green;1.2 ^reset;
跳跃高度+^green;15 ^reset;%，坠落伤害x ^green;0.9 ^reset;
速度+^green;30 ^reset;%
免疫：泥、雪、丛林污垢

^orange;环境^reset;：
 ^green;森林与丛林^reset;生物群系：健康x ^green;1.1 ^reset;
 ^green;葱郁和苔原 ^reset;生物群落：速度+^green;10 ^reset;%
 ^red;寒冷^reset;生物群落：生命再生：-^red;10 ^reset;%

^orange;武器^reset;：
矛和短矛：伤害x ^green;1.15 ^reset;
弓：伤害x ^green;1.02 ^reset;，Crit Chance+^green;5 ^reset;%，暴击伤害+^green;2 ^reset;%
魔杖和法杖：伤害x ^red;0.9 ^reset;，生命再生-^red;5 ^reset;%
狙击步枪：伤害x ^red;0.85 ^reset;，暴击率-^red;1 ^reset;%

^red;缺点^reset;：
饥饿+^red;25 ^reset;%
防御x ^red;0.9 ^reset;
